question:
Sashastra Seema Bal (SSB):
  1. Was established in 1963 following Sino-Indian War
  2. Was previous called Special Service Bureau
  3. Is entrusted with guarding the country’s border with Nepal and Bhutan
Which of the above is / are correct?
explanation: SSB is one of the CAPF which was established in 1963 following Sino-Indian War and it was formerly known as Special Service Bureau. It is entrusted with guarding the country’s border with Nepal and Bhutan. It is currently under the administrative control of the Ministry of Home Affairs (not defense).
